vulnerability_findings.name: pragma
vulnerability_findings.message:
Different versions of Solidity is used in Router.sol:
	- Version used: ['ABIEncoderV2', '^0.6.0']
	- Router.sol#3 declares pragma solidity^0.6.0
	- Router.sol#4 declares pragma experimentalABIEncoderV2

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in Router.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.6.0 (Router.sol#3): it allows old versions
